//: PLEASE REPLACE THIS ENTIRE FILE WITH YOUR SERVICE ACCOUNT JSON KEY
1. Go to the Google Cloud Console -> IAM & Admin -> Service Accounts.
2. Select your service account or create a new one with the 'Vertex AI User' role.
3. Go to the 'Keys' tab, click 'Add Key', and create a new JSON key.
4. A JSON file will be downloaded. Paste its entire content here.
